title.text:
Distance Traveled by Runners
A group of runners recorded the distance they have traveled.
Draw a line plot and answer the questions below.

1. How many runners were there?
2. What was the longest distance traveled?
3. How many runners traveled less than 45 miles?
4. What was the most common distance traveled by the runners?
5. How many more runners traveled 42 miles than 62 miles?
6. How many runners traveled more than 50 miles?

Courtesy of JonAyves Learning Club
YouTube: @JonAyvesTV | Instagram: @AJsHouseKids
